about_the_game:
Dala and the Cursed Forest is a Roguelike Deckbuilder with a unique card fusion mechanic.
• Choose from distinct decks to start off your run.
• Strategically play, combine, and transform cards while using different items to overcome an array of creatures.
• Earn rewards and discover new cards throughout your journey.
• Conquer over the forbidden forest and restore peace to Dala’s sanctuary.
• Start over from the beginning when you die!


Build the deck the way you want to play.
Your card choices affect how well you can go up against different monsters.




Combine different cards to create a more powerful card!
But remember there are times when it might be better to keep things separate.




Transform Dala into powerful forms unlocking new cards and abilities.
Combine cards to create a Cell that can be used to power up your skills.
Gather four identical Cells to transform into a special form with powerful new cards that let you swing the fight in your favor!




Encounter surprising events that can bless or curse your run.
Each choice you make impacts the items you collect and your odds of survival.




Cook renowned Thai cuisine at this feline restaurant run by a quirky cat chef.
Use ingredients from defeated monsters to prepare meals that grant special buffs.
Meet the Shopkeeper to buy new cards, equipment, and potions, or sell items to earn currency.


A forbidden forest has been cursed by the misuse of a mysterious power, spreading corruption across the land and its creatures. Join Dala on her quest to restore peace as she explores and purifies the forest of its corrupted inhabitants.

When Dala and the Cursed Forest leaves Early Access, it will come with:

• Four Gods, each with their own unique set of cards.
• 400+ normal cards and combined cards.
• 80+ different items to be found.
• 80+ unique combat encounters.
• 40+ mysterious events and mini-games.
• A tale from the Cursed Forest.
• 20+ skills on the talent tree for Dala and her Fairy.
detailed_description:
JOIN OUR OFFICIAL DISCORD COMMUNITY


Get the latest news and chat directly with us:


About the Demo


Dala and the Cursed Forest is a Roguelike Deckbuilder with a unique card fusion mechanic.
• Choose from distinct decks to start off your run.
• Strategically play, combine, and transform cards while using different items to overcome an array of creatures.
• Earn rewards and discover new cards throughout your journey.
• Conquer over the forbidden forest and restore peace to Dala’s sanctuary.
• Start over from the beginning when you die!


Build the deck the way you want to play.
Your card choices affect how well you can go up against different monsters.




Combine different cards to create a more powerful card!
But remember there are times when it might be better to keep things separate.




Transform Dala into powerful forms unlocking new cards and abilities.
Combine cards to create a Cell that can be used to power up your skills.
Gather four identical Cells to transform into a special form with powerful new cards that let you swing the fight in your favor!




Encounter surprising events that can bless or curse your run.
Each choice you make impacts the items you collect and your odds of survival.




Cook renowned Thai cuisine at this feline restaurant run by a quirky cat chef.
Use ingredients from defeated monsters to prepare meals that grant special buffs.
Meet the Shopkeeper to buy new cards, equipment, and potions, or sell items to earn currency.


A forbidden forest has been cursed by the misuse of a mysterious power, spreading corruption across the land and its creatures. Join Dala on her quest to restore peace as she explores and purifies the forest of its corrupted inhabitants.

When Dala and the Cursed Forest leaves Early Access, it will come with:

• Four Gods, each with their own unique set of cards.

• 20+ skills on the talent tree for Dala and her Fairy.
name: Dala and the Cursed Forest Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Window 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Phenom II
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Ghaphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Intel Corei5 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT630
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A Roguelike Deckbuilder with fun card fusion and transformations. Combine different cards to create powerful combos and generate power cells that can be used to unlock special abilities. Collect four identical cells to transform Dala into special forms to take on powerful mythical creatures.
